description.en: Learn that 'as soon as' and 'unless' in future contexts are followed by present simple, never future tense. 'Unless' means 'if not' - don't add extra 'not'.
description.es: Aprende que 'as soon as' y 'unless' en contextos futuros van seguidos de presente simple, nunca futuro. 'Unless' significa 'si no' - no añadas 'no' extra.

tip.en: 'As soon as' (like 'when') is ALWAYS followed by present simple in future contexts, NEVER future tense. 'Will' goes in the other clause.
tip.es: 'As soon as' (como 'when') SIEMPRE va seguido de presente simple en contextos futuros, NUNCA futuro. 'Will' va en la otra cláusula.
